description.value:
This handheld snare drum is adorned with garish scenes of battle and triumph. When played, no matter what rhythm, it always gives the impression of a marching beat, invoking armies on the move. While playing the drums, you gain a +1 item bonus to Performance checks and a +5-foot status bonus to your Speed.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from this instrument to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Shield]{Shield}
  • 1st@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Mage Armor]{Mage Armor}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Magic Missile]{Magic Missile}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.True Strike]{True Strike}
  • 2nd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.False Life]{False Life}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sound Burst]{Sound Burst}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spiritual Weapon]{Spiritual Weapon}
  • 3rd@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Haste]{Haste}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Heroism]{Heroism}
  • 4th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spell Immunity]{Spell Immunity}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Tortoise and the Hare]{Tortoise and the Hare}
  • 5th@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Death Ward]{Death Ward}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Quicken Time]{Quicken Time}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Spell Immunity]{Spell Immunity}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
